parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the node. You can call the [GetTaskInstanceRelation](~~424711~~) operation to query the node ID.

parameters.name: NodeName
parameters.description: The name of the node. You can call the [GetTaskInstanceRelation](~~424711~~) operation to query the node name.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  To view the ID of the tenant, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~).
